price: So do not let those who disbelieve in it and follow their desires distract you from it[5], or you will perish.’”
arabic: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنۡهَا مَن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرۡدَىٰ
footnotes: [5] Or from preparation for the Hour.
